----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Test set: external/test_sets/disks/DFRWS-2006.raw
- Output directory: external/carver_output/results/DFRWS-2006(1)
- Scenario: Recovering JPEG files by Sequential Carving only
- Program arguments: external/test_sets/disks/DFRWS-2006.raw external/carver_output/results/DFRWS-2006(1)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Output structure (automatic generated)

1.  corrupted: contains 1 corrupted JPEG file

2.  decoded
    2.1 fragmented: contains 4 fragmented/partially-decodable JPEG files
    2.2 recovered: contains 14 fully-recovered JPEG files

3.  logs: log files that may be used during the carving process

4.  scaled14.jpg - scaled JPEG thumbnail
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
